Name Rascal/Libraries/ValueIO/readTextValueFile
Synopsis Read a value from a text file.
Function
  1. value readTextValueFile(loc file)
  2. &T readTextValueFile(type[&T] result, loc file)
Description
  1. Read a value from a text file.
  2. Read a typed value from a text file.
